Subject: Major Incident Resolved: Issue with SCE11 transactions
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear All,

 

Weâ€™re pleased to confirm that the issue with SCE11 transactions is resolved. The transactions are flowing okay.

 

Issue Summary: 

Impact: All B2B and B2C transactions in/out of SCE11 were on hold.

Additional: RF Scanners were unable to log in during the incident.

 

Resolution & Recovery:

*	Transactions have resumed normal flow.
*	RF Scanners are now logging in successfully.
*	Monitoring is in place to ensure stability.

 

Business Impact:

Delayed B2B and B2C transactions are being processed.

No further disruption expected. 

 

Issue reported Date and Time:  28 Aug, 2025  10.14 AM GST

End Time : 28 Aug, 2025 

Status: Resolved

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by
